plot: In 1936 when Japanese intelligence receives a tip about a visit by a Chinese Communist Party member to Shanghai, there are tragic consequences.
title: Duo ming jing hun Shanghai tan
plot_es: In 1936 when Japanese intelligence receives a tip about a visit by a Chinese Communist Party member to Shanghai, there are tragic consequences.
original_name: Duo ming jing hun Shanghai tan
plot_en: In 1936 when Japanese intelligence receives a tip about a visit by a Chinese Communist Party member to Shanghai, there are tragic consequences.
